name: smart-seeker
description: An Obsidian plugin that enables fast and intelligent note search using RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) with Pinecone vector database and OpenAI

scripts.version:commit: git add manifest.json versions.json package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.version:major: node version-bump.mjs major && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:minor: node version-bump.mjs minor && npm run version:commit
scripts.version:patch: node version-bump.mjs patch && npm run version:commit
scripts.release: git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags

author: anpigon <markan82@gmail.com>
